name: Ocean Defender
description:
Ocean Defender is a 2D tower defence game about defending the sea from harmful materials such as plastic and toxic waste.

  • Use a variety of turrets and traps to destroy incoming enemies and protect the sea turtles across several unique levels.
  • Use different defences to defeat Trash, Oil Cans and Toxic Waste enemy types.
  • Complete the game to unlock "Turtle-y Impossible Mode" for an extra challenge!

(If the viewport size is incorrect, try using the fullscreen option).

Made by Theo Clarke for Save The Environment Game Jam 2018-2019.

Software used: Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop, Logic Pro X
